title: COURSE SETUP MARKETING & LAUNCH
job_overview:
?

???? Virtual Assistant – Beauty Course Marketing & Webpage Build

Read through the entire description to be considered for the job.

We are a fast-growing Hair Extension beauty brand offering luxury online and in-person courses for aspiring hair professionals. Our mission is to empower women to launch their own profitable beauty businesses through high-quality education, coaching, and branding.

We are seeking a creative, detail-oriented, and tech-savvy Virtual Assistant who can help bring our online course platform to life, and market it effectively through email and social media.

?

???? Key Responsibilities
 • Course Webpage Creation: Build an aesthetic, on-brand course sales page on our website (basic web design or platform builder experience required).
 • Sales Funnel Setup: Create an evergreen course funnel, including payment links and automation.
 • Instagram Integration: Add direct links from Instagram to course page and booking/payment.
 • Email Marketing: Write and schedule engaging, high-converting Flodesk emails to promote our courses and mentorship programs.
 • Blog Writing: Create well-researched, SEO-friendly blog content about beauty, hair extensions, and business tips.
 • Slide Design: Design clean, professional PowerPoint slides for webinars that reflect our brand.
 • Content Planning: Assist with basic content calendars, captions, and light editing for Instagram posts and stories.

?

???? Tech Access Required
 • Laptop or computer
 • Canva
 • Flodesk
 • CapCut (for light video editing)
 • WhatsApp (for daily communication)
 • Website builder experience (Shopify, Squarespace, or similar)
 • Strong internet connection

?

? Must-Haves
 • Excellent written English and grammar
 • Strong attention to detail and ability to follow creative direction
 • Great communication and responsiveness
 • Interest in beauty, wellness, or women-led businesses
 • Ability to convey emotion and brand tone through writing
 • Experience with basic sales funnels and email sequences is highly preferred

?

???? Bonus (not required but a plus)
 • Experience with Kajabi, Thinkific, or other course platforms
 • Instagram/Meta ad experience
 • Understanding of the beauty industry


We’re excited to welcome a VA who’s passionate about growing alongside our business and who takes pride in creative, high-quality work.
